name: Philip Morris International Inc.
summary: Philip Morris International Inc. (PMI) is a leading multinational tobacco company, best known for brands such as Marlboro, L&M, and Chesterfield, with products sold in over 180 countries. Spun off from Altria in 2008, PMI has diversified into smoke-free products and medical technology while maintaining a significant share of the global tobacco market. The company is headquartered in Stamford, Connecticut, with operational headquarters in Lausanne, Switzerland.
